TopicTitle: Need Some Help With Creating Custom Parts

Articles.Content: Hello. I'm trying to create a custom part mod for KSP 2 but I'm not 100% sure how to set everything up so that my custom part will show up in-game without any problems. The images below show what I have so far in Unity. I know there is a creating custom parts section on the SpaceWarp documentation, but some parts of it are a little hard to follow.

i believe you might need to select the base core part data script, color module and drag module that can be found via thunderkit. searching add component doesnt make anything show but if you click scripts under it you can then find all the default scripts for these 3 items
